markdownRemark.html: Food Room is a Cooking & Tasting School located in Guadalmina, a Cooking & Tasting School that regularly offers participative courses and workshops on all types of cooking, pastry and bread making, wine tasting and cocktails. The courses are designed for food lovers, both for residents of the Costa del Sol, as well as tourist who are attracted to Spain by the gastronomic richness of the country. The training sessions are in Spanish and English.
